meanings.sent1: The weather today is unideal for a picnic.
meanings.sent2: Her unideal painting still captured the beauty of the landscape.
meanings.sent3: It was unideal that the cat chose to nap on the freshly washed laundry.
meanings.sent4: The unideal timing of the storm ruined our outdoor event.
meanings.sent5: The unideal lighting in the room made it difficult to read.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to an ideal standard.
meanings.sent1: The unideal quality of the product disappointed the customers.
meanings.sent2: His unideal performance did not meet the company's expectations.
meanings.sent3: It was unideal that the cake turned out lopsided despite following the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The unideal fit of the dress made her feel self-conscious.
meanings.sent5: The unideal alignment of the shelves made the room look messy.

meanings.definition: Not the best or most suitable option.
meanings.sent1: Choosing the unideal route led to a longer journey.
meanings.sent2: The unideal solution did not fully address the problem.
meanings.sent3: It was unideal to forget the keys inside the locked car.
meanings.sent4: The unideal location of the hotel made it inconvenient for sightseeing.
meanings.sent5: The unideal choice of colors clashed in the room decor.
